Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute at Lake Shore Drive/44th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temp. rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/44th
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to debris on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
